identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

theme.name: Electric Night
theme.description: A high-energy, futuristic festival vibe. Dark backgrounds with glowing neon accents to simulate a night concert or cyberpunk event.

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Fest names

mono.usage: Code snippets, countdown timers, technical stats

gallery.interaction: View Transition API + Framer Motion layoutId

buttons.interaction: Scale down on click (0.95), Glow on hover
buttons.classes: rounded-none font-bold uppercase tracking-wider transition-all duration-200

cards.classes: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 hover:border-white/20 transition-colors

inputs.classes: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 focus:border-white/80 rounded-none px-0

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL 'lenis' IMMEDIATELY. Standard scrolling is forbidden.
Use 'Unbounded' font for all headings. Import from Google Fonts.
Use 'Space Grotesk' for body text. Import from Google Fonts.
Implement the 'Tracing Beam' effect for the Hero section.
Use the 'Tetris Grid' (Mode A) for the Landing Page layout.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
For the Gallery, use a Masonry layout with 'framer-motion' layoutId for smooth expansion.
Admin Dashboard must use 'High Density Grid' (Mode B) with glassmorphism sidebar.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid dark colors with noise/grain texture overlays.
Use the provided image URLs for their respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients).
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do NOT apply universal transition (e.g., transition: all).
Do NOT center align the app container.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are recommended.
